io.odysz.semantic.jsession

Class AnSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • io.odysz.semantic.jserv.ServPort<AnSessionReq>
          • io.odysz.semantic.jsession.AnSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISessionVerifier, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(description="session manager",
            urlPatterns="/login.serv11")
public class AnSession
extends ServPort<AnSessionReq>
implements ISessionVerifier
    1. Handle login-obj: AnSessionReq.

    a: "login | logout | pswd | init | ping(touch)",
    uid: "user-id",
    pswd: "uid-cipher-by-pswd",
    iv: "session-iv"

    2. Session verifying using session-header

    uid: “user-id”,
    ssid: “session-id-plain/cipher”,
    sys: “module-id”

    Session object are required when login successfully, and removed automatically. When removing, the JUser object is removed via session lisenter.

    Note:

    Session header is post by client in HTTP request's body other than in HTTP header. It's HTTP body payload, understood by semantic-jserv as a request header semantically.

    Also don't confused with servlet session - created via getSessionId(),
    and you'd better turn off it.

    3. User action can be logged with session information

    AnSession requires loggings sql semantics explicitly defined in "semantic-log.xml", with file name hard coded.

    Logging can be disabled by connection configuration. Each connection requiring loggin must have a table named "a_logs".

    Author:
    odys-z@github.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • init

        public static void init(io.odysz.semantic.DATranscxt daSctx)
                 throws SAXException,
                        IOException,
                        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException,
                        SQLException
        Initialize semantext, schedule tasks, load root key from tomcat context.xml. To configure root key in tomcat, in context.xml, 
                <Context>
                <Parameter name="io.oz.root-key" value="*************" override="false"/>
        </Context>
        Parameters:
        daSctx -
        Throws:
        SAXException - something wrong with configuration files
        IOException - file accessing failed
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException - semantics error
        SQLException - database accessing error
